description:
2017年5月大学英语六级口语考试第七场次的论述题目：谈论医疗的重要性。医疗的重要性不言而喻，考生如何在1.5分钟之内，说出有效的内容呢？答案是利用1分钟的准备时间理清思路，想好关键词，这样在实际谈论中就会做到心中有数，不至于无话可说。

Every one of us can be sick, from catching a cold to suffer from some serious diseases such as cancer, heart disease and so on. So in the long run, nobody can live without medical treatment, which can relieve our pain, curb the spread of disease and save our lives. And in the perspective of social development, medical treatment can prevent infectious diseases from spreading, which ensure the life security of the mass who shoulder the responsibility of promoting social development, and medical treatment prolong the life span of the people to some extent. Therefore, medical treatment helps a single person to live better and the society to develop better.
